name: Cubes and Dimensions
description:
Cubes and Dimensions is a 2D puzzle platformer that requires you to push cubes and change your current dimension.

All the puzzles are straightforward with them still becoming more difficult as the game progresses.

The game also doesn't always focus on puzzle based problems with some levels being timed to complete.

Throughout the game the player will fly through wind, avoid the red and push buttons to reach the exit.
